mentions.context: In short, FreeSurfer segments the gray/white and gray/cerebrospinal fluid borders, which delimits the gray-matter.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
All simulations were generated using the OSCA software.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
We used R 42 (v3.6.2) for analyses not performed using OSCA 6 and for plots.
We used the color-blind friendly R palette viridis, 43 ukbtools 44 to facilitate UKB phenotype manipulation, Morpho and Rvcg 45 to identify clusters, rgl 46 to generate brain plots of associations.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
We processed the T1w and T2 FLAIR images together to enhance the tissue segmentation in FreeSurfer 6.0, 17 which should result in a more precise skull stripping and pial surfaces definition.
80.6% of the participants processed using T1w only, spike-like cortical parcellation in FreeSurfer) 12 (see Supplementary 1 in the Supplemental Material for more details on QC).
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
We extracted vertex-wise data mapping cortical surface area and thickness ("recon-all" processing in FreeSurfer) and used the maximal resolution allowed by the software (fsaverage atlas -unsmoothed).

In addition, we applied the ENIGMA-shape processing, 21,22 where subcortical structures segmented in FreeSurfer are projected onto spherical atlases to quantify vertex-wise radial thickness and log Jacobian determinant, 21,22 which is analogous to a surface area.
We used the color-blind friendly R palette viridis, 43 ukbtools 44 to facilitate UKB phenotype manipulation, Morpho and Rvcg 45 to identify clusters, rgl 46 to generate brain plots of associations.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
We used the color-blind friendly R palette viridis, 43 ukbtools 44 to facilitate UKB phenotype manipulation, Morpho and Rvcg 45 to identify clusters, rgl 46 to generate brain plots of associations.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
Other packages used include, dplyr, 47 readr, 48 rmarkdown, 49 matrixStats, 50 RcolorBrewer, 51 gridExtra, 52 ggplot2, 53 png, 54 and epuRate.
Second, gray-matter vertices are semiarbitrary features which may be defined and measured in different ways (e.g., different cortical meshes in FreeSurfer).
We extracted vertex-wise data mapping cortical surface area and thickness ("recon-all" processing in FreeSurfer) and used the maximal resolution allowed by the software (fsaverage atlas -unsmoothed).
